metadata.name: Marquise qui chante 1
metadata.description: Noravisionsolarmetaverse is a dreamful realm of diverse expressions, materials, emotions, dimensions, visual works, paintings, ceramics, polyester, and ceramic sculptures, transposed into virtual realms...Many of my previous cycles of Artworks, presented physically through diverse exhibitions are residing there, ceramic sculptures from "Saloma" , "Virtual hug", polyester sculptures "Sarcophages", video collages "Associated fragments of Realities", cycles of paintings on solar panels "Noravisionsolar" - "Luce dell Eterno" , "Artes Dei", "Metamorphoses - The Worlds of Change", "The Garden of Eden" , and many more from previous graphic cycles. Visual expressions are mixed with voice, poetry, dance...
